headline: Liberty Broadband (LBRD.K): Citi’s Fresh Buy Sparks Interest in Valuation and Charter Stake
summary: Citi’s decision to resume coverage of Liberty Broadband (LBRD.K) with a Buy rating is prompting fresh interest in the stock. The focus now shifts to Liberty’s large stake in Charter, the potential undervaluation of its shares, and the prospects for improved free cash flow. See our latest analysis for Liberty Broadband. Liberty Broadband’s share price has come under significant pressure over the past year, notching a 1-year share price return of -39% and a 1-year total shareholder return of...
